content:
Certainly! Here are some Chinese dessert places you may want to try in San Francisco:

1. Golden Gate Bakery - this bakery specializes in Chinese-style pastries, especially their egg tarts.
2. U:Dessert Story - they offer a variety of modern and traditional Chinese desserts, such as shaved ice, mango pudding, and mochi.
3. Sheng Kee Bakery - this bakery offers a range of Chinese-style cakes, buns, and sweet pastries, along with bubble tea and other drinks.
4. Twisted Donuts & Coffee - this patisserie is known for their Chinese-style donuts with flavors like taro and red bean. 
5. Chantal Guillon - they offer a range of macarons inspired by Chinese flavors, like green tea and lychee.

I hope you find these recommendations useful and enjoy trying out some Chinese desserts in San Francisco!
